document.full_text: top mobile telecom equipment makers joined automakers in warning of a damaging supply squeeze as the impact of japan's devastating earthquake spreads, adding to fears in a sector hampered by shortages.
document.title: japan supply squeeze worries spread to telco gear
lines_and_colors: top mobile telecom equipment makers joined automakers in warning of a damaging supply squeeze as the impact of japan's devastating earthquake spreads, adding to fears in a sector hampered by shortages.
